summary: This bill, S. 1896, aims to modify the expedited review process for export licenses of advanced technologies to Australia, the United Kingdom, and Canada. Specifically, it amends Section 1344 of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2024 to clarify the definition of 'export' to include various transfer types of defense articles and services. The bill was introduced by Senators Cornyn and Coons and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
